Tireless Spirit: Min 1 Fighting Spirit after initiative
Unwavering Mark: After melee hit, adjacent target Disadv attack other, provokes self bonus attack w/Adv +10 HP damage for 1 tn 2/long rest
Vigilant Defender: Reaction for opportunity attack on every other creature's tn
Warding Maneuver: R5' When ally struck, give +1d8 AC and damage resistance to ally 1/long rest
